data.host: ECU IP address (must be wifi for ECU-R)
data.query_method: Which method to query the ECU. ECU_R should choose socket, ECU_R_PRO and ECU_C should choose http
data.scan_interval: Query every X seconds, ECU only updates data every 300 seconds, choosing shorter interval not recommended.

error.cannot_connect: Can't connect to ECU, check log
error.no_ecuid: No ECU ID returned from ECU-R
